member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_TABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_IPMCAST_IF_TABLE structure contains a table of IP multicast interface entries.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: Specifies the number of interface entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_TABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of interface entries implemented as an array ofMIB_IPMCAST_IF_TABLE structures.
